item.description: My name is Zifan Wang (王子凡). I mostly go by Atticus. As of summer 2024, I am a rising junior at MIT studying pure math, primarily interested in homotopy theory and adjacent areas. I also dabble in physics and machine learning. In a parallel universe, I may be a guitarist, a chemist, or a writer.
